Top 4

I love making lists. These are some of my definitive Top 4s.

Top 4 Albums

  1. Transatlanticism by Death Cab for Cutie
  2. Turn on the Bright Lights by Interpol
  3. Bloom by Beach House
  4. Person Pitch by Panda Bear

Top 4 Films

  1. Heat by Michael Mann
  2. Jaws by Steven Spielberg
  3. The Empire Strikes Back by Irvin Kershner
  4. Army of Shadows by Jean-Pierre Melville

Top 4 Directors

Ranked by my personal filmography score:

  1. Dennis Villeneuve at 4.43 out of 5 stars
  2. Noah Baumbach at 4.07 out of 5 stars
  3. Christian Petzold at 3.93 out of 5 stars
  4. Christopher Nolan at 3.86 out of 5 stars

Top 4 Christmas Songs

  1. Just Like Christmas by Low
  2. Sleigh Ride by The Ronettes
  3. White Christmas by Bing Crosby
  4. Star of Wonder by Sufjan Stevens

Top 4 Holidays

  1. Canadian Rockies and Vancouver Island with Kate
  2. New York City with my boys
  3. Bergen and Tromsø with Kate
  4. California with the Colbestraße boys
Alexander Huth
